title: Meeting the Growing Energy Needs of Artificial Intelligence, Vertical Farms, and Cooling
content: The convergence of economic development, urbanization, technological innovation, and environmental challenges necessitates novel approaches to meeting and managing energy demands. Three emerging trends present unique challenges that make striking the appropriate balance to meet societal needs particularly challenging for our energy systems.
